physical_examinations.vital_signs: Blood glucose: 2.2 mmol/L (initially); fluctuated between 2.9 and 4.5 mmol/L after treatment
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No enlargement of superficial lymph nodes; BMI of 22.5 kg/m2; right breast large mass soft and uneven in texture; elevated skin temperature; nipples cauliflower-like with erosion.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The right breast mass gradually increased in size from a bean-like hard mass to the size of a soccer ball, accompanied by skin redness, pinprick-like pain, and nipple ulceration over time.
